short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks files that should not be downloaded by standard users, allows a whitelist of domains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will block file downloads that the average end user should not be downloading.
Certain domains are allowed and future development will allow for these settings to be adjusted.
